act_info.full_title: Trans Day of Remembrance Act, 2017, S.O. 2017, c. 29

content.content: 1 November 20 in each year is proclaimed as the Trans Day of Remembrance.
content.raw_html: 1 November 20 in each year is proclaimed as the Trans Day of Remembrance.

content.content:
2 (1) At 10:29 a.m. on each Trans Day of Remembrance, the members of the Assembly shall pause and observe one minute of silence in honour of trans people who have died as a result of anti-trans violence.  Same (2) If the Assembly is not sitting on November 20, the members shall pause and observe the moment of silence at 10:29 a.m. on the next Thursday that the Assembly is sitting. 3 Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
2 (1) At 10:29 a.m. on each Trans Day of Remembrance, the members of the Assembly shall pause and observe one minute of silence in honour of trans people who have died as a result of anti-trans violence.

Same

(2) If the Assembly is not sitting on November 20, the members shall pause and observe the moment of silence at 10:29 a.m. on the next Thursday that the Assembly is sitting.

3 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

4 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________

 

Français
